Name: Choco Pixel 7
About the game: Choco Pixel 7 is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space avoiding traps and choosing the right directions to avoid dead ends. In Choco Pixel 7: - Traps - Chocolate - Sweets - Cool music - 50 levels - Pixel art
